hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#cd /Library/WebServer/Documents/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
#php wikipedia.php _ 'tw' #-> is just for single connector, it will not process any 6c
#php run.php _ '{"connector":"gen_wikipedia_by_lang", "divisor":10, "task":"initial", "langx":"en", "cont_2next_lang":"Y", "six_coverage":"1st"}' php run.php _ '{"connector":"gen_wikipedia_by_lang", "divisor":10, "task":"initial", "langx":"en", "cont_2next_lang":"N", "six_coverage":"1st"}'
# php run.php _ '{"connector":"gen_wikipedia_by_lang", "divisor":10, "task":"initial", "langx":"ru", "cont_2next_lang":"Y", "six_coverage":"1st"}' #-> is just for 6c connectors, works OK
